The way of talking about everything, or what is more culturally rooted, taking that into account.
This can only be verified after long and multiple exchanges which would allow one to update one's cultural references in the right context.

To feel confident that an AI system really gets my cultural perspective, it would need to show that it understands the important values and traditions. It should give responses that make sense in my cultural context, especially when it comes to sensitive stuff. And if it makes a mistake, it should learn from it and get better instead of repeating it. Basically, I’d feel good if the AI really listens, learns, and adjusts to what I’m saying.
Tag 1: Acknowledgment of cultural values and traditions

ResponseText: To feel confident that an AI system understands and respects my cultural perspective, it should demonstrate cultural sensitivity by recognizing key values, traditions, and communication styles. The AI should incorporate local knowledge, adapt to feedback, and show respect for religion and community leaders. It should also acknowledge mistakes. This approach would build trust and ensure the AI offers culturally appropriate advice.
